body:
I scan the whole NTR story while looking for Zero no Mono works and....

DAFUQ WHERE IS MA KAZOKU PART 2, SON OF B-!!
Can anyone tell the summary of h9's dialogues. I'm quite curious as to what fmc is saying
Wait what the hell is happening on that hentai the mc was basically a cuck no cap

I don't understand H9's work.
Why is the mc not shanking the guy yet?
This is extremely unlikely even in hentai sense?
Why? What reason do you have to not shank the glasses dude?
He's wearing glasses, you fuck. That's the most punchable thing on God's green earth.
I DON'T UNDERSTAND!!!!!!!
.
nice art though.

I literally have no idea what the hell is happening on the second one
Even with the image as context i still can't grasp it like huh?
Was she raped then fell for the dick? And were those the girl's parents? What did the blonde guy bowed for huuuhhh????????

We all knew this was how the story would go it just came with a slight curve ball and what's left to continue? Is he going to fuck his daughters next? If by some miracle they really are the mc's that is. I'm sure i will tune in next time for the next disappointing diarrhea instalment just to see if it's as disappointing as this.

Wait, so it's the MC's kid because on page 47 he came prematurely, but the lucky bullet was pushed in and made the bullseye by the chad? ... ... That's ... .. a new one. Not sure if that's a victory, or a defeat as now he is trapped with her for good.
so many good shit
@weissheitch Dah lewat batas tu, gak worth it lagi.
so thats how you cuck a guy who isn't afflicted with the micro-dick curse.  Seriously, the tunnel vision of cucks are really laughable.

The only thing I can think H9 will do in part 2 is explain why she became a cheating slut. Because according to my translation (idk if correct) one of MC's monologs says "And without me knowing, Himeno is...". So at this point, it's just cheating no longer sex friends, kinda.
I just saw some ntr trash 🗑️
Level tertinggi mencintai seseorang adalah Lu di suruh tanggung jawab saat doi ngentot ma orang lain dan beranak..

H9 story : just like predictions of some people here. The black haired guy become crazy ultimate cuck and for some reason being forced to take responsibility by her parents and raising the kids while the glasses guy keep fucking the girl until the end...
Genuine Question ... Does People Like Him Really Exists ?   nigga really really ?
What if the next kid she has looks EXACTLY like Kenji?

H9's series: I love the art but story just went from shit to re-processed shit. Damn it's insane, after reading it you'll find that NTR stories like these feel like characters are 'locked up' in a very small world, where only those characters revolve in the world and barely anyone else. They will cling to that relationship like life or death. Even FMC is just destined for her to have no brains but only crave for some lustful sex with only that douche and douche doesn't appear to be fucking other women, just to spice shit up to piss at MC "hey muthafucka, I will keep fucking her OK? that's ma job in this manga". Overall, it's OK, I've read it, been there done that, I appreciate the art a lot (especially the fuckings are engaging), fuck the story cuz it didn't even hurt at all, more like a tossed tofu-kun that missed my face and splat on the ground to be laughed at.

Unless the next kid she is having after a DNA test is Kenji's kid so they get caught, he divorces her and she gets nothing and has to take that baby with her. He keep the kids to raise and maybe gets  a new wife.
I knew MC and the FMC will be married but the glasses dude still gonna fuck her deym  no justice for MC feels bad
I literally cannot see how can the H9 story be milked out any more...
Typical
One day he will find them doing it and there will be murder. That would be a bonus chapter later.

@Blankroom was it her parents who did the dna test because they probably blamed the mc because he's rich, but you're right the kids look like him and the fmc so i suppose it's a small reprieve for him because at least he might not be raising kenji's kids.
h9 author really should get a life.
literally what was the point of chapters 2-5
@Blankroom thanks i can't read this but i got the jist of it. If they showed him a dna test glasses probably just printed it on his computer because there is no fucking chance that 1st kid is his.

The h9 story is pathetic & predictable everything i said in the chapter 5 comments happened. It's retarded bullshit that everyone saw coming after reading part 5 and it looks like the end but i think it says continue or next to be at the end if i'm not mistaken could somebody confirm that? If it isn't over lol how the hell can glasses cuck him more.
Woah damn thats insane
